tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE asset_movements (
    asset_id INT NOT NULL,
    movement_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    movement_date DATE NOT NULL,
    from_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    to_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE asset_movements (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    movement_date DATE,
    from_location VARCHAR(50),
    to_location VARCHAR(50),
    movement_type VARCHAR(20),
    movement_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE asset_transfers (
    transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    transfer_date DATE,
    from_user_id INT,
    to_user_id INT,
    transfer_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE asset_movements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT,
  movement_ts TIMESTAMP,
  from_location VARCHAR(100),
  to_location VARCHAR(100),
  movement_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE asset_transfers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT,
  transfer_ts TIMESTAMP,
  from_owner VARCHAR(100),
  to_owner VARCHAR(100),
  transfer_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AssetMovements (
  asset_id INT NOT NULL,
  movement_date DATE NOT NULL,
  from_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  to_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  movement_time TIME NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (asset_id, movement_date, movement_time)
);

CREATE TABLE AssetTransfers (
  transfer_id INT NOT NULL,
  asset_id INT NOT NULL,
  from_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  to_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transfer_date DATE NOT NULL,
  transfer_time TIME NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (transfer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AssetHistory (
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  asset_id INT NOT NULL,
  event_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  event_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  event_time TIME NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AuditTrail (
  audit_id INT NOT NULL,
  asset_id INT NOT NULL,
  action_taken VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  action_date DATE NOT NULL,
  action_time TIME NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (audit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE asset_movements (
  asset_id INT,
  movement_type VARCHAR(50),
  movement_date DATE,
  from_location VARCHAR(100),
  to_location VARCHAR(100),
  PRIMARY KEY (asset_id, movement_date)
)

CREATE TABLE asset_transfers (
  transfer_id INT,
  asset_id INT,
  from_location VARCHAR(100),
  to_location VARCHAR(100),
  transfer_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (transfer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE asset_audit_trails (
  trail_id INT,
  asset_id INT,
  action_taken VARCHAR(50),
  action_date TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (trail_id)
)

CREATE TABLE asset_details (
  asset_id INT,
  asset_name VARCHAR(100),
  asset_type VARCHAR(50),
  acquisition_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (asset_id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
  user_id INT,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  account_type VARCHAR(20),
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
)
